Title: Provides that public contracts shall be open for use by municipalities not originally party to such agreements unless such agreements expressly state otherwise
Summary: Provides that public contracts shall be open for use by municipalities not originally party to such agreements unless such agreements expressly state otherwise.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the letting of municipal contracts
